name: Journalism class
description:
Ashley returned to the university after her expulsion. She lives in a hostel with a roommate. In the classroom she finds a new girlfriend, with whom she thinks for a long time about creating relationships. Is it necessary for her? And who is she really? Who is Dr. Laurence? And whence does he know Ashley?
Dive into the world of the main character and get answers to all questions.Features
  • The first part of novel;
  • А story full of emotions;
  • Story that will branch according to your "choice";
  • Many characters in one story;
  • Surprising ending;
  • Steam achievements.
